attributes.action: Stop Islamic culture taking over in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There are sufficient outlets in the UK to satify the Minority need for meat prepared Halal or Kosher - The drive to expand this custom of prepatation of food to outlets which in the main serve Christian requirements - There should be a law passed to preserve these outlets and not pander to the minority

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
